channel.title: About on Xiaozhe Yao
channel.description: Recent content in About on Xiaozhe Yao

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am Xiaozhe Yao, currently a master student at the Institute of Informatics (IFI), University of Zurich. Research Interest Machine Learning Model, Data and Application Management. AID. Machine Vision. Learned Indexes and its application in databases EurusDB (private only). Publications In chronological order: Yao, Xiaozhe. “MLPM: Machine Learning Package Manager.” Workshop on MLOps, MLSys, 2020. Chen, Yingying, and Xiaozhe Yao. “CVTron Web: A Versatile Framework for Online Computer Vision Services.
